django.utils.translation.template
=================================

.. py:module:: django.utils.translation.template

----------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.utils.translation.template.TRANSLATOR_COMMENT_MARK
   django.utils.translation.template.dot_re
   django.utils.translation.template.context_re
   django.utils.translation.template.inline_re
   django.utils.translation.template.block_re

Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.utils.translation.template.blankout
   django.utils.translation.template.templatize


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: TRANSLATOR_COMMENT_MARK
   :value: 'Translators'


.. py:data:: dot_re

.. py:function:: blankout(src, char)

   Change every non-whitespace character to the given char.
   Used in the templatize function.


.. py:data:: context_re

.. py:data:: inline_re

.. py:data:: block_re

.. py:data:: endblock_re

.. py:data:: plural_re

.. py:data:: constant_re

.. py:function:: templatize(src, origin=None)

   Turn a Django template into something that is understood by xgettext. It
   does so by translating the Django translation tags into standard gettext
   function invocations.
